# [Interview #527: DragonCon 2010 Q&A Report - Marie Curie, Entry #8](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=527#8)

#### Question

In Book 5, we have all of those wagons filled with
*ter'angreal*
from the Waste. Are we ever going to see that again?

#### Brandon Sanderson

RAFO.
